name: Stealthly Simple
description:
Controls:

Use A and D to move, E to attack, R to reset the level,  and space to jump. Avoid getting caught by your enemies and kill all of them to advance to the next level.

Criteria:

Criterion NameDescribe implementationStealthYou lose instantly if someone sees you. Enemies are also attracted to sound.JumpYou need to jump to get over obstaclesPurpleMOST objects that you can interact with are colored purpleWham! SoundsEvery time you push a block, jump or attack you make a sound.

We joined this jam half way through, and on top of that we couldn't work on it as much as we wanted to because of school, so expect some bugs. We hope you like it anyway.
